title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. D, ch. VII, subch. A, Surrogate's Forms, form P-5 - Citation
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. D, ch. VII, subch. A, Surrogate's Forms, form P-5 - Citation

State Regulations
(Form P-5)
(Citation)
PROBATE CITATION File No. ________
SURROGATE'S COURT - COUNTY
CITATION
THE PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW
YORK, By the Grace of God Free and

Independent
TO
A petition having been duly filed by
________, who is domiciled at ____________
YOU ARE HEREBY CITED TO SHOW CAUSE before
the Surrogate's Court, ____________ County, at ____________, New York, on ________
19________, at o'clock in the noon of that day, why a
decree should not be made in the estate of ____________
lately domiciled at ____________
admitting to probate a Will dated
____________, (I) [FN3] ( ____________ and I jointly and
severally) undertake that defendant will appear in
a copy of which is attached, as the Will
of ____________
deceased, relating to real and personal
property, and directing that
[ ] Letters Testamentary issue to: ____________
[ ] Letters of Trusteeship issue to: ____________
[ ] Letters of Administration c.t.a. issue
to ____________
(State any further relief
requested)
HON. Dated, Attested and Sealed, Surrogate
________, 19________ ________
(Seal) Chief Clerk
____________
Attorney for Petitioner Telephone

Number
____________
Address of Attorney
[Note: This citation is served upon you as
required by law. You are not required to appear. If you fail to appear it will
be assumed you do not object to the relief requested. You have a right to have
an attorney appear for you.]
P-5 (9/96)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. D, ch. VII, subch. A, Surrogate's Forms, form
P-5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
